markdownRemark.html:
The dude trains all day and writes a blog at night. Thatâ€™s dedication or a sign that he doesnâ€™t train hard enough if he has the energy for that.

So, does 1000 cuts with a real heavy sword, nice! Respect. Once heâ€™s done the master orders him to do 500 more. Iâ€™m starting to like this master more and more ðŸ‘Œ

In a blink of an eye, Tajiro has training for 6 months, all day every day. While he did the daemon is hibernating, first time weâ€™re told they can do that.

Then after a year, the master tells him heâ€™s done with him, nothing will be taught. What?! Ok training all day every day for a year might be 10 years in conventional training (a few hours a week). Stillâ€¦ the master is harsh.

The cat masked man has appeared

Such a nice fight! Wooden vs steel. Of course, wood won, because itâ€™s not the weapon but the swordsman that counts.

The small wise girl

Ok, I like this girl!

Closing words

Fantastic episode, the fights deserve a 5 out of 5. The last part is a little bit confusing, was he dreaming about the masked swordsman and the wise girl? Was he real? I donâ€™t fully get it, hopefully, it will get clarified in the next one.
